data.name: City Worlds
data.detailed_description:
City Worlds is a chill city builder where you can shape your cities freely. Yet you have to keep the environment and your citizens in mind as they don't easily (and directly) forgive your mistakes.

You start of with a small population. Place some roads and homes so they have a place to sleep. After that add a few industrial buildings where your people can work and some shops where they can spend their money. Of course you shouldn't forget to cover their basic needs of water, food and electricity and lastly keep them happy and entertained with parks and amusement buildings like cinemas and co.

Content

Traffic System

Manage the dynamically simulated traffic to avert traffic jams and relieve your streets by adding public transport.

Buildings and needs

Your citizens have different kind of needs that have to be met. The most basic ones being food, water and electricity. They'll get very angry, might demonstrate and stop paying taxes completely if you fail to provide them Also keeping them happy and educated by providing entertainment and cheap education will probably bring you quite far.

Environment

Buildings can and will impact the environment in all sorts of ways. Global warming and rising sea levels exists. Coal plants emit toxic gasses and create smog which your people probably won't like. Miss managed buildings will have a bigger chance for things to go wrong and you don't want that to happen with a nuclear power plant.

Expanding

Expand your island to your hearts desire (and your PCs capabilities), nothing is limited.

Research

Research new ways of transportation, energy, agriculture and much more.

data.short_description: City Worlds is a city builder where your playstyle directly impacts the environment and people of your cities.
